channel.title: Multnomah County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Multnomah County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-5 North Exits 307 and 308
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 307 - OR-99E/Delta Park/Marine Drive, and approaching Exit 308, Hayden Island/DOT Permits. Exit 308 is the last exit in Oregon on I-5.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 306B
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 306B - Victory Blvd./Expo Center. Use Exit 307 for T-6 (Terminal 6)/Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 304
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 304 - Rosa Parks Way.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit305 A-B
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 305AB - US-30 By-Pass/Lombard St

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 304
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 304, Rosa Parks Way. Distance marker for next three exits - Lombard Ave., Columbia Blvd., and Martin Luther King Jr Blvd.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 302B
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 302B - I-405 South/US-30 West/St. Helens. US-30 westbound leaves I-5 northbound here. Continue north on I-5 for Seattle.

item.title: OR-99E North at Morrison St.
item.description: OR-99E North (SE Grand Ave.) at Morrison St. Turn left for I-5, Morrison Bridge, Salem (via I-5 South), and Seattle (via I-5 North).

item.title: OR-99E North Approaching Morrison St.
item.description: OR-99E North (SE Grand Ave.) approaching Morrison St. west to I-5, Morrison Bridge, Salem (via I-5 South) and Seattle (via I-5 North).

item.title: SE Belmont St. East Approaching OR-99E
item.description: SE Belmont St. East approaching OR-99E/(To) US-26 East/(MLK Blvd.) to Milwaukee.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 300B Offramp
item.description: I-5 South - Exit 300B Offramp in Portland. Use right lane for Morrison St./City Center. Use left lane for Oregon City and OMSI (Oregon Museum of Science and Industry).

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 300B
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 300B - US-26 East/OR-99E/OMSI (Oregon Museum of Science and Industry)/Oregon City. The Willamette River is in the background.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 301
item.description: I-5 South approaching Exit 301 - I-84/US-30 West/The Dalles. I-84 eastbound begins here, and ends in northeastern Utah. Continue on I-5 south for Salem.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 300B
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 300B. Use Exit 300B for Central Eastside/Industrial District.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 302A
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 302A - Broadway - Weidler St./Moda Center.

item.title: I-405 North at Exit 3
item.description: I-405 north at Exit 3 - US-30 West/St. Helens. US-30 east joins I-405 north across the Willamette River. Use I-405 North/US-30 East for The Dalles (via I-5 and I-84) and Seattle (I-5).

item.title: I-405 North - Exit 3
item.description: I-405 north approaching Exit 3 - US-30 West/St. Helens. Continue on I-405 North/US-30 West for Seattle (via I-5) and The Dalles (via US-30 and I-84).

item.title: I-405 North Approaching Exit 3
item.description: I-405 north approaching Exit 3 - US-30 West/St. Helens.

item.title: I-405 North - Seattle
item.description: I-405 North - Seattle.

item.title: I-405 North - Exit 2B
item.description: I-405 north approaching Exit 2B - Everett St./Glisan St.

item.title: I-405 North - Exit 2A
item.description: I-405 north at Exit 2A - Salmon St./Providence Park. Approaching Everett St./Glisan St. interchange, and US-30 west interchange.

item.title: I-405 North - Exit 1D
item.description: I-405 north approaching Exit 1D - US-26 West/Beaverton.

item.title: US-26 West at I-405 North - Portland
item.description: US-26 West (SW 6th Ave.) at I-405 North in Portland. Use I-405 North/US-26 West for the Zoo and Forestry Center. US-26 west joins I-405 northbound.

item.title: US-26 West at SW Caruthers Ave.
item.description: US-26 West at SW Caruthers Ave. Merge left for Caruthers Ave., 6th Ave, Terwilliger Blvd, VA Hospital, and University Hospital. Merge right to continue west on US-26 and for I-405 junction.

item.title: US-26 West Approaching SW Caruthers Ave
item.description: US-26 West approaching SW Caruthers Ave in Portland. use SW Caruthers Ave. for 6th Ave, Terwilliger Blvd., Oregon Health Sciences University, VA Hospital, and University Hospital.

item.title: US-26 West - Naito Parkway
item.description: US-26 west at Naito Parkway in Portland.

item.title: US-26 West at I-5/OR-10/OR-43 in Portland
item.description: US-26 West at I-5/OR-10/OR-43 in Portland. Use right lane for I-5 South and OR-43 to Lake Oswego (OR-43) and Salem (I-5). Use outer right lane for US-26 West to (Portland) City Center. Use left lane for OR-10 West/Barbur Blvd.

item.title: US-26 West on the Ross Island Bridge
item.description: US-26 West on the Ross Island Bridge approaching I-5, OR-10, and OR-43. Use right lane for I-5 and OR-43 to Salem (I-5) and Lake Oswego (OR-43). Use left lanes for US-26 and OR-10 to City Center (Portland - via US-26) and Barbur Blvd. (OR-10).

item.title: US-26 West at SE 9th Ave (To OR-99E)
item.description: US-26 West (SE Powell Blvd.) at SE 9th Ave (To OR-99E).

item.title: US-26 West Approaching OR-213
item.description: US-26 West (SE Powell Blvd.) approaching OR-213 (SE 82nd Ave) in Portland.

item.title: US-26 West at I-205 North
item.description: US-26 West at I-205 North in Portland.

item.title: US-26 West Approaching Powell Valley Blvd.
item.description: US-26 West approaching Powell Valley Blvd. in Gresham. Use left lane (Powell Blvd.) to continue west on US-26 to Gresham and Portland.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 27
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 27 - WA-14/Vancouver/Camas. The milemarkers and exit numbers along I-205 do not reset back to zero when crossing into Washington. They continue on the Oregon numbering scheme. Although this is a Washington exit, this sign is still within Oregon.

item.title: I-205 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Last distance marker on I-205 north in Oregon. Distance to WA-14, I-5, and Seattle.

item.title: I-205 North - Leaving Portland
item.description: Leaving Portland on I-205 north, on bridge over Columbia River.

item.title: NE Airport Way at I-205 North
item.description: NE Airport Way at I-205 North to Seattle.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 28
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 28 - Bridal Veil/Historic Columbia River Highway.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 25
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 25 - Rooster Rock State Park. Use Exit 25 for Rooster Rock State Recreation Area.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 22
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 22 - Corbett.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 18
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 18 - Lewis and Clark State Park/Oxbow Park. This bridge over the Sandy River on the approach to this interchange is under construction when this photograph was taken.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 17
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 17 - Marine Drive/257th Ave. Continue east on I-84/US-30 for The Dalles and Hood River.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 17
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 17 - Marine Drive/257th Ave.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 16
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 16 - 238th Drive/Wood Village.

item.title: I-84/US-30 East - Historic Columbia River Highway Diagram
item.description: Route diagram for the Historic Columbia River Highway on I-84/US-30 East. Use Exit 17 (last Portland Metro. Area exit) on I-84/US-30 East for the Historic Highway. The Historic Columbia River Highway and I-84/US-30 rejoin before Cascade Locks.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 14
item.description: I-84/US-30 east at Exit 14 - Fairview Parkway.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 13
item.description: I-84/US-30 East at Exit 13 - 181st Ave./Gresham.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 13
item.description: I-84/US-30 East approaching Exit 13 - 181st Ave.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 10
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 10 - 122nd Ave.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 22
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 22 - I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles. I-205 continues north to Portland Airport and Seattle.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 22
item.description: I-205 North at Exit 22 - I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 21B
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 21B - I-84/US-30 West/Portland.

item.title: I-205 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-205 north to the next three interchanges on I-205 north. Distance to I-84/US-30 West, I-84/US-30 East, and Sandy Blvd.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 21B
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 21B - Glisan St.

item.title: I-205 North - Exits 20 and 21A
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 20 - Washington St./Stark St. Approaching Exit 21A - Glisan St.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 19
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 19 - US-26/Powell Blvd./Division St.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 19 and Next Exits
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 9 - US-26/Powell St./Division St. Use Exit 19 for Gresham and the DMV. Distance marker for two approaching Exits - Glisan St. (Exit 21A) and I-84/US-30 West/Portland (Exit 21B).

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 17
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 17 - Foster Road.

item.title: I-205 North - Entering Portland and Multnomah County
item.description: Entering Portland on I-205 North. Also entering Multnomah County.

item.title: US-26 West - Exit 71A
item.description: US-26 west at Exit 71A - OR-8/Canyon Road.

item.title: US-26 West - Exits 71B and 71A
item.description: US-26 west at Exit 71B - Sylvan. Approaching Exit 71A - OR-8/Canyon Road.

item.title: US-26 West - Beaverton Exits and Exits 71AB
item.description: US-26 West approaching Exit 71B - Sylvan. Truck traffic, including Exit 71A bound truck traffic, need to use the right truck lane. Also a sign on the bridge lists the Beaverton Exits - Canyon Road, ORE Hwy. 217, and Cedar Hills Road.

item.title: US-26 West - Exit 72
item.description: US-26 west at Exit 72 - Zoo/Forestry Center. Access to the Portland Zoo and Washington Park.

item.title: Offramp for I-405 North to US-26 at 12th Ave.
item.description: Offramp from I-405 to US-26 west at 12th Ave. interchange. Stay in left lanes for US-26 West/Ocean Beaches/Beaverton. Speed limit is 50 MPH. This speed limit sign is one of the newer style speed limit signs seen on Oregon freeways, with the word LIMIT included.

item.title: I-405 North - Exits 1D and 2A
item.description: I-405 north at Exit 1D - US-26 West/Beaverton. Approaching Exit 2A - Salmon St./JELD-WEN Field. Also a sign for the next two exits on I-405 North - Everett St./Glisan St. and US-30 West.

item.title: I-405 North - Exit 1D
item.description: I-405 north at Exit 1D - US-26 West/Beaverton.

item.title: I-405 North - Exits 1B and 1C
item.description: I-405 north at Exit 1B - 4th Ave. Approaching Exit 1C - 6th Ave. Next two exits along I-405 north are US-26 West and Salmon St.

item.title: I-405 North - Exits 1B and 1C
item.description: I-405 north approaching Exit 1B - 4th Ave and Exit 1C - 6th Ave. Also, there is a warning against hazardous material traffic on US-26 west through the Sunset Tunnel.

item.title: I-5 South at I-405 Split
item.description: I-5 south at the I-405 split in Portland. Use left lane for I-405 North/US-26 West/Beaverton. Use right lane for I-5 South/Salem. This exit ramp is on the end of the Marquam Bridge over the Willamette River.

item.title: I-84 To I-5 Ramp at City Center IC
item.description: Ramp connecting I-84 west to I-5 south at City Center/OMSI exit. Continue south for I-5 south to Beaverton and Salem. OMSI stands for the Oregon Museum of Science and Industry.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 13
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 13 - 181st Ave./Airport Way.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 14
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 14 - Fairview Parkway.

item.title: 238th Ave. North at I-84
item.description: 238th Dr. North at I-84/US-30 onramp. Turn right for I-84/US-30 west to Portland. Continue across overpass for I-84/US-30 East to Troutdale and Hood River.

item.title: South 238th Drive at I-84
item.description: South 238th Drive at I-84. Use left lanes for I-84/US-30 West to Portland.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 16
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 16 - 238th Drive/Wood Village.

item.title: I-84 Frontage Road at 257th Ave. and I-84
item.description: I-84 Frontage Road East at 257th Ave. and I-84. Turn right for 257th Ave. and Mount Hood Community College. Continue straight for I-84/US-30 east onramp to The Dalles. Turn left for I-84/US-30 west to Portland.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 17
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 17 - Marine Drive/Troutdale. This is the first exit westbound in the Portland Metropolitan Area. Directly east of here is the Columbia River Gorge National Scenic Area.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 17
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 17 - Marine Drive/Troutdale. Entering Troutdale and crossing the Sandy River. The Sandy River is the boundary of the Columbia River Gorge National Scenic Area.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 18
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 18 - Lewis and Clark State Park/Oxbow Nature Park.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 22
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 22 - Corbett. The Columbia River is in the background of the photograph.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 25
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 25 - Rooster Rock State Park

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 29
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 29 - Dalton Point. Access to Dalton Point State Recreation Park, located on the Columbia River.

item.title: I-5 South at I-405/US-26
item.description: I-5 south at I-405/US-26 to City Center and Beaverton. Taken on the western approach to the Marquam Bridge over the Willamette River. I-5 continues south to Salem.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching I-405
item.description: I-5 south approaching I-405/US-26 to City Center and Beaverton. Taken on the Marquam Bridge over the Willamette River. I-5 continues south to Salem.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 13
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 13 - 181st Ave./Airport Way.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 22
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 22 - Corbett

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 25
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 25 - Rooster Rock State Park

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 1A and Exit 1B (Washington)
item.description: I-5 north approaching Washington Exit 1A - WA-14 East/Camas and Exit 1B - City Center/6th St./Convention Center. Taken on Interstate Bridge over Columbia River.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 307 Onramp - Drawbridge
item.description: Exit 307 onramp onto I-5 north. Warning sign for drawbridge on I-5 north over the Columbia River.

item.title: Marine Drive West at I-5 North
item.description: Marine Drive west at I-5 north onramp to Seattle.

item.title: Marine Drive West Approaching I-5 North
item.description: Marine Drive west approaching I-5 north onramp (Exit 307) towards Seattle.

item.title: US-30 West - St. Johns Bridge
item.description: US-30 west at St. Johns Bridge over the Willamette RIver. Continue west on US-30 for Scappoose and St. Helens.

item.title: US-30 West - Nicolai St.
item.description: End freeway on US-30 west in Portland. Use right lane for Nicolai St. Eastbound; left lane for Nicolai St. West/Montgomery Park. Continue west on US-30 for Yeon Ave. and St. Helens.

item.title: I-405 South - Exit 3
item.description: I-405 south approaching Exit 3 - US-30 West/NW Industrial Area/St. Helens. Taken on the bridge over the Willamette River.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 302B
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 302B - I-405/US-30 West/St. Helens. US-30 leaves I-5 here and continues on I-405 across the Willamette River.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 302C
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 302C - Greeley Ave./Swan Island. In the background is the I-5/I-405 split.

item.title: I-5 North Approaching Exit 302B
item.description: For I-5 north to Seattle use left lanes. Approaching Exit 302B - I-405/US-30 West/St. Helens.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 302A and 302B
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 302A - Rose Quarter/Broadway-Weidler St. Approaching Exit 302B - I-405/US-30 West/St. Helens.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 302A
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 302A - Rose Quarter/Broadway - Weidler St.

item.title: End I-84 West at I-5
item.description: End I-84 West at I-5. Use I-5 north to Seattle; I-5 south to Salem.

item.title: I-84 West - Use I-5 North For US-30.
item.description: I-84 west approaching I-5. Use I-5 north to continue west on US-30.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching I-5
item.description: I-84 west approaching I-5 in Portland. Use right lanes for I-5 north to Seattle; left lanes for I-5 south to Salem. This is the western end of I-84.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching I-5
item.description: I-84 west approaching I-5. Use right lane for Convention Center/Rose Quarter via I-5 north. Use middle lane for Seattle and (Portland) City Center via I-5 north. Use left lane for Beaverton and Salem.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching I-5 to Salem and Seattle
item.description: I-84 West approaching I-5 to Salem and Seattle.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 1
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 1 - Lloyd Center.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 2
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 2 - 43rd Ave.

item.title: I-84/US-30 West - Portland
item.description: I-84/US-30 West overhead in Portland.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 9
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 9 - I-205/Salem/Seattle. Continue west on I-84/US-30 for Portland.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 9
item.description: I-84/US-30 west approaching Exit 9 - I-205/Seattle/Salem. Continue west on I-84 for Portland.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 9
item.description: I-84/US-30 west approaching Exit 9 - I-205/Seattle/Salem. Use right lanes to continue west on I-84/US-30 to Portland.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 13
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 13 - 181st Ave./Airport Way.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 25
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 25 - Rooster Rock State Park.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 31
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 31 - Multnomah Falls.

item.title: I-84 West - Historic Highway Diagram (Exit 35)
item.description: I-84 West - Exit 35 Exit Diagram. Use Exit 35 for the Historic Columbia River Highway.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 35
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 35 - Historic Highway/Ainsworth State Park.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 37
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 37 - Warrendale.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 40
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 40 - Bonneville Dam/National Historic Landmark.

item.title: I-405 North Exit 3
item.description: I-405 north approaching Exit 3, US-30 West/St. Helens, 3/4 mile.

item.title: I-405 North Exit 3
item.description: I-405 north at Exit 3, US-30 West/St. Helens. I-405/US-30 East crosses the Willamette River here on the Fremont Bridge.

item.title: I-5 North - Entering Washington
item.description: Entering Washington on I-5 north, on the Interstate Bridge over the Columbia River.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 1A/1B (Washington)
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 1A, WA-14/Camas and Exit 1B, City Center/Convention Center on Interstate Bridge approaching Washington State Line.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 1A/Vancouver Exits
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 1A (WA) WA-14/Camas, and overhead for next three Vancouver exits. Taken at foot of Interstate Bridge on the Columbia River.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 304
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 304, Portland Blvd. Overhead for next three exits.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 305
item.description: Use Exit 305, Lombard St., for Portland Airport, and Air National Guard. Overhead for I-5 North to Seattle.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 306B
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 306B, Expo Center.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 307
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 307, OR-99E/Delta Park/Marine Drive, 3/4 mile. Use next exit for Portland Meadows, and Portland Intl. Raceway.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 307/308
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 307, OR-99E/Delta Park/Marine Drive, and approaching Exit 308, Jantzen Beach, 1/2 mile. Exit 308 is the last exit in Oregon on I-5.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 308 - Last Oregon Exit
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 308, Janzten Beach. Exit 308 is the last exit in Oregon on I-5. Distance marker showing distance to Olympia, Tacoma, and Seattle.

item.title: I-5 North Exit305AB
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 305AB, US-30 By-Pass/Lombard St, 1/2 mile.

item.title: US-26 East Approaching I-405
item.description: US-26 east approaching I-405. US-26 east follows I-405 south towards The Dalles and Salem.

item.title: US-26 East at I-405
item.description: US-26 east approaching I-405 and Market St. into Downtown Portland.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 71
item.description: US-26 east approaching Exit 71, Sylvan, 1/2 mile.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 72
item.description: US-26 east at Exit 72, Zoo/Forestry Center.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 73
item.description: US-26 east approaching Exit 73, Canyon Road/PGE Park, 1 mile.

item.title: Distance Marker on I-205 North
item.description: Next 3 exits on I-205 north: I-84 West, I-84 East, and Sandy Blvd.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 19
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 9, Powell St. Overhead for next 2 exits, Glisan St and I-84.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 21B
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 21B, I-84/US-30 West/Portland, 1/2 mile.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 22
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 22, I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles, 1 1/4 miles.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 22
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 22, I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles, and I-205 overhead to Portland Airport/Seattle.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 23AB
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 23A, US-30 Bypass East/Sandy Blvd.
